title: Amazing Opportunity to Live in Downtown SF 2x1 Apartment Home!
map_address: 1190 Mission Street near near 8th St. and Mission
posting_body: ['1190 Mission Street at Trinity Place is a luxurious, modern building right in the center of SOMA.', 'Our well-designed apartment homes come equipped with full-size kitchens, including a dishwasher and garbage disposal.', 'The modern white cabinets on white walls and black granite countertops give our homes a trendy and sleek atmosphere.', 'The walnut laminate floors add warmth and texture.', 'The spacious floor plan in our two bedroom apartment homes offers privacy with a lush courtyard view.', 'You cannot go wrong in any home!', 'Our community has a large gym as well as a secluded outdoor plaza where you can picnic in the San Francisco sun.', 'We offer 24-hour front desk attendants as well as on-site maintenance for daily work orders and emergencies.', 'You will feel confident that you are in a home that provides all your needs.', 'In person and virtual tours available!', '3D Tour Link: <URL>', 'Features:', '- Largest SF Whole Foods in our community!', '-Amazon Locker Package Room', '-Muni and BART station on the same block', "-Walk Score of 95, Biker's Score of 97, Transit Score of 100", '-Walk-in closets', '-Granite countertops', '-Spectacular city views', '-Direct access from the building into the secluded Piazza courtyard', '-24-hour front desk associates', '-State-of-the-Art Fitness center', '-Laundry on every floor', '-Parking spaces available for rent in an enclosed garage', '-Direct access from the building into the garage', '-Pets allowed subject to company guidelines', '-No smoking', '-Pictures of similar apartment shown', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
